sentences.sentence: One of the wittiest exemplars of the technique was M. C. Escher.
sentences.translation: 该技术最巧妙的代表之一是埃舍尔。

sentences.sentence: One of the wittiest exemplars of the technique was m.
sentences.translation: 最为巧妙地运用那种技巧的一个典型人物就是M。

sentences.sentence: Poetry contests were held, with the prizes going to the wittiest, sharpest verses.
sentences.translation: 还会举行诗歌比赛，最风趣、最犀利的诗歌会获得嘉奖。
